channel.title: Level of Lake Constance (Bodensee) on Current and historical information on the level of Lake Constance
channel.description: Recent content in Level of Lake Constance (Bodensee) on Current and historical information on the level of Lake Constance

item.title: Analysis
item.description: Background analyzes of the level of Lake Constance can be found here. We differentiate between two types: [1. Fundamentals]({{ relref . “/02_01_basics” }}). This is primarily about methodology and general considerations about the level. [2. Individual Analysis]({{ relref . “/02_02_individual” }}). This section looks at individual events.

item.title: About
item.description: And here you can find “About” information, such as the imprint, contact details, etc. And I also want to talk a little about the background of this website. Why Technical Realization Release Notes Contact and Imprint Logo The most important information is: Please note. All statements without guarantee. I’m trying to build a reliable and helpful website here. But at the end of the day it’s a hobby. All information is therefore without guarantee.
